reviews.review: Добрый день.. Это мой 5 или 6 аккаунт по счёту. Я ПРОЕБАЛ НА ЭТУ ИГРУ ОКОЛО 6К ЧАСОВ. Даже не заходи сюда, если у тебя проблемы с психикой

its a bad game. Maybe at one point it was good but now it's just so shit. It turns nice people into terrible people, it makes you change. Once a person starts to play this game in general, they are then turned into a changed person. This game will corrupt you. It will turn you from a nice person into an actual piece of shit. If you play this game, do it. However, it's going to cost you your humanity. I don't recommend this at all. Don't download or play this piece of crap game. 
In conclusion, don't download this game because it's going to turn good people bad, less toxic people very toxic and will overall destroy a person's humanity.
